
### Laboratory staff perceptions

#### Laboratory staff perception of factors contributing to the a) success and b) barriers/challenges with respect to laboratory testing for arboviral infections (ref Q20)

```{r}
successes_barriers <- read_csv("../data/Country_level_summarized_responses.csv")
successes_barriers <- successes_barriers %>%
  filter(Region == params$region ) %>%
  droplevels() %>%
  select( Country, Successes = Q20_successes, Barriers = Q20_barriers) 

responses <- get_responses("20")
cbind(Country=data$SI01, responses) %>%
  select( -Response ) %>% 
  left_join( successes_barriers, by="Country") %>%
  regulartable() %>% 
  theme_zebra(odd_header="#048ECA", odd_body = "#D6EAF8") %>% 
  color( color="#FFFFFF", part="header" ) %>% 
  autofit()
```
